name: UrbanHaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, Tell haiku reader to read me a haiku”
”Alexa, Tell Haiku Reader to read me a poem”
”Alexa, Ask Haiku Reader to tell me something”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des:
Urban Haiku Reader expresses random haikus for one who enjoys the city life. All that you have to do is simply ask and listen to Alexa read out entertaining poems for your busy city life.
Just say something like, “Alexa tell Haiku Reader to read me something.”
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
